companies.name: The Tarzan Way
description: Implemented enhancements and resolved issues within the frontend project, introducing user-centric features aimed at facilitating streamlined data manipulation for enhanced usability.
Successfully deployed updates without any downtime, ensuring continuous availability for users.
Employed AWS services, notably S3 integrated with CloudFront and Lambda functions, to deploy the frontend project, thereby optimizing loading times and mitigating latency issues.
Demonstrated expertise in frontend development, AWS deployment, and optimizing user experience.
Contributed to improving the overall performance and reliability of the application.

companies.name: MediBuddy
description: Designed, developed, and maintained a full-stack web application utilizing Next.js for the frontend and Nest.js for the backend. The platform was architected following a microservices approach, serving as a marketplace for third-party vendors to efficiently sell their products.
Employed event logging to handle user interactions and gather data on user behavior.
Collaborated with a team of developers and designers to gather requirements, design, and develop new features and enhancements.
Developed various APIs with authentication to enable secure communication between the frontend and backend.
Incorporated new APIs into an ongoing project to enhance existing features and functionality.

companies.name: NamaSYS
description: Developed efficient programs to automate tasks involving scraping data etc.
Successfully debugged and resolved code issues related to data storage in the database, ensuring accurate data management.
Worked with different APIs and SQL databases to retrieve and store data for data analysis.

Implemented an end-to-end solution on Microsoft Azure, involving the creation of virtual machines and Developed a automation script to retrieve data from APIs and securely store it in Azure Blob Storage.
